channel.title: Port-forwarding
channel.description: Can someone please help me... I have a belkin router and i have no idea how to port-forward..... If possible can you provide pics??? and when I registered my server it told me I had to register a name on my server so it could be tested.... does that mean it's up?

item.title: Port-forwarding
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Port forward related topics aren’t allowed, use the guides provided in the tutorial section or http://portforward.com

Read full topic
